name: Wildheart
description:
This needs more thought, but initial instincts are:

  • Druid, but more exclusively rooted to the natural world

  • Consider porting over some Ranger abilities

  • Ties to the heart of the earth? Getting at some big unknown world core concept?

  • Should be able to summon rivers to surge, change weather, etc.

  • Melee but with natural weapons (claws, teeth, etc.). Maybe you can choose an aspect of an animal to always have available for combat.

  • Wild shape but more interesting
